dt: {bc}contaminated by an infective agent (such as a bacterium) and producing pus

dt.t: But if the patient can manage it, the whirlpool is a dandy way to handle {wi}festering{/wi} bedsores.

dt: {bc}persisting and growing increasingly bitter over time

dt.t: … comedy that comes from a pit of {wi}festering{/wi} hatred …

Four hundred yards to the west, between the schoolhouse and the mountain, lay a {wi}festering{/wi} center of sin, a bootleg whiskey still operated by the celebrated anti-Prohibition guerilla Sam Reever.

shortdef: contaminated by an infective agent (such as a bacterium) and producing pus
persisting and growing increasingly bitter over time
persistently producing bad or unhealthy effects

dt: {bc}to cause increasing poisoning, irritation, or bitterness {bc}{sx|rankle||}
{bc}to undergo or exist in a state of progressive deterioration

shortdef: to cause increasing poisoning, irritation, or bitterness : rankle
